text:
Girls night out during Restaurant Week was a lot of fun.  We all tried something different so we could get a wider taste of options.

Although the <pumpkin soup> was flavorful, it was a little thin for my personal preference.  The <short ribs> were so tender and pretty amazing.  Dessert was my least favorite of the three, the <apple crisp> was just middle of the road.

The <Pinot Noir> with dinner was excellent; however, the after dinner <cappuccino> turned out to be an over hot <latte>.  Not bad, just not made correctly.

The service was very good.  Our server provided good descriptions of our options, was very attentive and friendly and offered good suggestions for drink and <wine> pairings.
